member.name: IDCompositionTranslateTransform3D.SetOffsetX
member.summary: Changes the value of the OffsetX property of a 3D translation transform effect. The OffsetX property specifies the distance to translate along the x-axis.
member.param: The distance to translate along the x-axis, in pixels.
member.returns: If the function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See DirectComposition Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IDCompositionTranslateTransform3D.SetOffsetX
member.summary: Animates the value of the OffsetX property of a 3D translation transform effect. The OffsetX property specifies the distance to translate along the x-axis.
member.param: An animation object that determines how the value of the OffsetX property changes over time. This parameter must not be NULL.
member.returns: If the function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See DirectComposition Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IDCompositionTranslateTransform3D.SetOffsetY
member.summary: Changes the value of the OffsetY property of a 3D translation transform effect. The OffsetY property specifies the distance to translate along the y-axis.
member.param: The distance to translate along the y-axis, in pixels.
member.returns: If the function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See DirectComposition Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IDCompositionTranslateTransform3D.SetOffsetY
member.summary: Animates the value of the OffsetY property of a 3D translation transform effect. The OffsetY property specifies the distance to translate along the y-axis.
member.param: An animation object that determines how the value of the OffsetY property changes over time. This parameter must not be NULL.
member.returns: If the function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See DirectComposition Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IDCompositionTranslateTransform3D.SetOffsetZ
member.summary: Changes the value of the OffsetZ property of a 3D translation transform effect. The OffsetZ property specifies the distance to translate along the z-axis.
member.param: The distance to translate along the z-axis, in pixels.
member.returns: If the function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See DirectComposition Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IDCompositionTranslateTransform3D.SetOffsetZ
member.summary: Animates the value of the OffsetZ property of a 3D translation transform effect. The OffsetZ property specifies the distance to translate along the z-axis.
member.param: An animation object that determines how the value of the OffsetZ property changes over time. This parameter must not be NULL.
member.returns: If the function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See DirectComposition Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IDCompositionTranslateTransform3D
member.summary: Represents a 3D transformation that affects the offset of a visual along the x-axis, y-axis, and z-axis.
